prompt: Create a bold, print-ready vector illustration artwork only (isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows). Vibrant hot pink solid background. Thick black vector-style outline around the isolated elements (text and graphics) ONLY; do NOT add a square frame or border around the entire image. ASPECT RATIO: Design for a 4:5 portrait canvas and fill the ENTIRE canvas — graphic elements and text must extend to the edges with no large empty margins; composition full, bold and immersive, centered and cropped so elements reach the edges. MAIN GRAPHIC: a large, cute cartoon cactus with a kawaii face (round black eyes, small smiling mouth, subtle rosy cheeks), a single pink flower on top, many short white spikes, sitting in a simple brown pot; stylized green triangular confetti/radiating shapes behind the cactus to add energy. TYPOGRAPHY and TEXT Hungarian: "TÜRELEM" (top) "RÓZSÁT TEREM" (above cactus) "NEKEM" (below cactus) "KAKTUSZ" (large, dominant) "JUTOTT" (bottom). Typography: bold, condensed uppercase display style; smaller words in solid white uppercase with heavy black vector outline; the main green words (especially "KAKTUSZ" and "RÓZSÁT TEREM") in bright lime-to-emerald gradient with thick black vector outline and subtle inner highlight; letters slightly rounded, high contrast, with some letters overlapping or tucked behind the cactus to create an integrated stacked hierarchy. VISUAL STYLE: flat vector art with minimal smooth gradients for volume, crisp shapes, no photographic textures or realistic lighting; all isolated elements (text and graphics) have a thick black vector outline only. Layout: stacked, centered composition with elements intentionally cropped to the edges so the design reads as full-bleed; print-ready clean design, bold and playful. Isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows. --ar 4:5
negative_prompt: no mockup, no garment, no fabric, no shadows, no people, no photorealism, no background textures, no border, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting

debug.extracted_text_raw: TÜRELEM RÓZSÁT TEREM NEKEM KAKTUSZ JUTOTT
debug.notes: All words are clearly legible in the image, arranged top-to-bottom; accents on vowels are present (e.g., Ü, Ó).
